name: TBH platformer
description:
TBH creature prototype

I found this little creature so cute that I wanted to make a simple platformer game for it. (This prototype ended up taking three days of hyperfixation, made in Godot.)

WASD or arrow keys to navigate.

Find & consume the photo snippings to complete the secret picture. There are a handful of power ups to use to your advantage. (It takes about five minutes to win, if you know generally where everything is.)

Special thanks to my friend Nat for the secret win picture, and thanks to friends more generally for advice on how to improve the game <3
